atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Use the `@tailwind` directive to insert Tailwind's `base`, `components`, `utilities` and `variants` stylesheets.

atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: Use the `@theme` directive to define your project's design tokens.

atDirectives.name: @apply
atDirectives.description: Use the `@apply` directive to inline any existing utility classes into your own custom CSS.

atDirectives.name: @custom-variant
atDirectives.description: Use the `@custom-variant` directive to define custom variants in Tailwind CSS v4.

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Use the `@layer` directive to tell Tailwind which 'bucket' a set of custom styles belong to.
